title: Random Bugsplat Window Appearing When There Isn't Any Bugs
body:
I keep getting messages that my game keeps crashing even though it's working fine. I usually get this from launching the client and after finishing a game where I never disconnected or experience any sort of high ping. 

Any reason for why this happens?

replies.body:
Hi,

I am also having the same problem, and this was already discussed here:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/EweNQsBU-bug-splat-when-launching-legacy-client-and-running-alpha-client-skips-the-patcher

I do have windows and my drivers updated and I already repaired the client a couple of times. I am still having this issue though. If you find a solution I would be grateful if you could post it here.

Thanks!

ElPouro

A member of our technical support team actually just mentioned he was experiencing this as well. It seems a quick repair of the client may resolve this, so go ahead and hit the cog icon in the top-right corner of the client and start the repair process.

Let me know if this fixes it for you.
